named-query.name: Func.findAll
named-query.query: select t from Func t order by t.id

named-query.name: Func.findByName
named-query.query: select t from Func t where t.name=:name

named-query.name: Func.findByCode
named-query.query: select t from Func t where t.code=:code

named-query.name: Role.findByCode
named-query.query: select t from Role t where t.code=:code
